title: Pixel 2 XL charges slowly or doesn't charge at all
content:
Hello,

After ~2 weeks after purchase charging got inconsistent, e.g. printing 'Charging rapidly' and not progressing at all or '5 minutes until full' at 12% of battery level and so on.

What I already tried:
1. A different cable/charger. Didn't help.
2. Battery calibration. I drained the battery to shutdown and tried to charge the phone. It only got to 30% after 2 hours.
3. Cleaning the port.

After cleaning it almost doesn't get stuck but charges very slowly, more than 2 hours from 1% to 100%. Inconsistent time of charging is still here too. Should I try anything else or it's the right time to contact Google support?
